'''''Cloud-Parting Carpfall''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|Chenyu's Blessings of Sunken Jade}}, wait 24 in-game hours, then speak to [[Lingyuan]] atop [[Chiwang Terrace]].
